content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Describe an argument made in the excerpt. Explain how the approach to knowledge described in the excerpt reflects developments of the 1500s and early 1600s. Explain one effect of the changes in European medicine during the late 1700s and 1800s.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
